1.0.0.name: wordpress/ustreamtv
1.0.0.description:
Ustream is the leading live interactive broadcast platform that enables anyone with an Internet connection and a camera to engage with their audience in a meaningful, immediate way.

Users can copy and paste URLs of live streams, videos and highlights from Ustream.tv into their WordPress blog posts.

This plugin automatically pulls in the video embed using the oEmbed protocol.
